wblut.external.straightskeleton

Class AngleAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.external.straightskeleton.AngleAccumulator

  • public class AngleAccumulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Keeps track of the angles of a polygon to decide on clockwise or counterclockwise determination. Should assume anti-clockwise traversal
    Author:
    twak
